meanings.definition: The quality or state of being detailed.
meanings.sent1: Her detailedness in organizing the event ensured everything ran smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The detailedness of the map helped us navigate through the forest easily.
meanings.sent3: His detailedness in packing for the trip was so precise that he even counted the number of socks.
meanings.sent4: The detailedness of her artwork was like a magnifying glass revealing hidden beauty.
meanings.sent5: The detailedness of the instructions made it impossible to make a mistake.

meanings.definition: The level of thoroughness or specificity in something.
meanings.sent1: The detailedness of his report impressed the professor.
meanings.sent2: We appreciated the detailedness of the recipe, as it made cooking much easier.
meanings.sent3: The detailedness of his excuse for being late was so elaborate that it sounded like a story.
meanings.sent4: The detailedness of her memory was like a library cataloging every moment.
meanings.sent5: The detailedness of his analysis left no room for doubt.
